title: 2017 Week 9 Preview: Deshaun Watson, Andrew Luck done for season, Osweiler starting for Broncos
itunes:title: 2017 Week 9 Preview: Deshaun Watson, Andrew Luck done for season, Osweiler starting for Broncos
description:
A room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler and Gregg Rosenthal preview all of the Week 9 action, starting with the breaking news of Deshaun Watson's season-ending injury and what it means for the Texans (1:00); Dan and Gregg recap the Jets' dominating victory over the Bills on Thursday Night Football -- with a little help from Keith Hanzus (6:30); The heroes discuss how things change for the Colts now that Andrew Luck has been placed on season-ending IR (14:20); What to expect out of the Broncos now that Trevor Siemian has been benched for Brock Osweiler (23:30); Is the Legion of Boom really dead? (32:30); The best listener submissions to name the official cat of the ATN Podcast #ATNCAT (35:30); Marc Sessler picks an interesting lock for what's expected to be the best game of the week (44:30); Can Brett Hundley be a serviceable backup QB for the Packers? (57:30); And more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
